nodes.text: Imperial patrol landspeeders were used by scout troopers on Edan II One was present at an outpost shortly after the Assault on Edan Base.
It had three repulsor engines tucked within the chassis. A rudimentary targeting system was placed at the front seat. The speeder also was marked with "Imperial Patrol" insignia on both sides.

A landspeeder redesigned for planetary patrol that was well armored and mounted a light repeating blaster on the forward hood. The blaster had a 180 degrees fire arc and was fired by the gunner in the forward passenger seat.

The Introductory Adventure Game uses its own rule set and doesn't state the speed in kmh. Making comparisons with other vehicles this patrol vehicle should be slower than usual landspeeders, the speed would be about 200 kmh.
